snippet: The assailants were shot dead Saturday night after they tried to storm a police station in the restive province of Xinjiang. Two police officers also died in the attack.
abstract: Nine assailants are shot and killed after attempting to storm police station in restive western province of Xinjiang; two police officers also die in attack.
lead_paragraph: The assailants were shot dead Saturday night after they tried to storm a police station in the restive province of Xinjiang. Two police officers also died in the attack.

headline.main: 9 Attackers and 2 Officers Reported Killed in Tense Western China
headline.print_headline: 9 Attackers and 2 Officers Reported Killed in Tense Western China
